alert.note: Alert for GUC110; GUC120 (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 1:09AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CHST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Until 415 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 109 AM ChST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan and Chalan Laulau. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
